Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, local and regional newspapers, CDs, DVDs, language cassettes and talking books (on CD and cassette). The library has a meeting room available for hire and exhibition space. Activities include Baby Time and Toddler Time, Under 5's Storytelling, coffee morning and Councillors' surgeries. Provides 6 People's Network computers with Microsoft Office, Internet access and 1 scanner available for public use.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10am-7.30pm, Tues & Thurs 9.30am-5.30pm, Wed closed, Fri 9.30am-7.30pm, Sat 9.30am-12.30pm (opening times); Tues 10-11am (Toddler Time, term-time only), 2-2.45pm (under 5s storytelling, term-time only), Thurs 10-11am (Baby Time, term-time only), 2nd Fri in the month 10.30am-12noon (Stocksbridge & Upper Don Community Health Forum, see separate entry), 2nd & 4th Sat in the month (Knit n Chat, see separate entry)
